txt.en:
'I hear some of Khirgi's men are uneasy about his obsession with Fushaum Tum. Perhaps they could be persuaded to join us?

'Take this gold and speak to them. See if they will come to our side of the conflict.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is only available while the quest, The Fushaum Resolution, is underway.</rgb>
'It seems a few of Khirgi's men took your words or the gold to favour and have decided to join us. I hope you did not pocket any of that gold for yourself!'
Bribe the poor to join Fushaum Bal South ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You should bribe the poor in Fushaum Bal North.
Thâng can be found at Fushaum Bal South.\n\nYou should talk to Thâng.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
